response.overview: Holly Golightly is an eccentric New York City playgirl determined to marry a Brazilian millionaire. But when young writer Paul Varjak moves into her apartment building, her past threatens to get in their way.
response.tagline: Audrey Hepburn plays that daring, darling Holly Golightly to a new high in entertainment delight!
response.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
